Metadata.title: Resonance Deck Builder
Metadata.description: Build and share your Resonance decks with ease

help.sort_characters: Sort characters in the order they appear in battle. The rightmost character is in front.
help.save_deck: Saves the deck preset to the local browser.
help.load_deck: Loads the deck preset from the local browser.

help.photo_mode: Press to automatically take a screenshot.
comments.title: Comments
comments.no_comments: No comments yet. Be the first to comment!
help.title: Guide
help.share: Copy a shareable link. Share your custom deck with others! (Includes equipment, breakthroughs, and all other details)
help.clear: Resets the entire deck. Once reset, the data cannot be recovered!
help.import: Load a deck from a code. (You can directly use the code exported from the game)
help.export: Export the current deck to clipboard. (Can be used directly in the game)
help.breakthroughs: You can set breakthroughs in the character info window by clicking the desired breakthrough level in the breakthrough tab.
help.usage_settings: Click on a skill card to open its settings. Usage conditions can be configured there.

skill_description_12300019: Launches a charged attack with the Gauss rifle, dealing damage and <color=#FF6666>breaking the target's shield.</color>\nAfter use, On Edge is replaced by Phalanx Charge.

skill_description_12300095:
Unleashes the Lightning Slice, dealing damage to enemies over 4 hits.
This card has Versability.
Versability: This card's effect varies depending on whether the caster is <color=#7AB2FF>Invisible</color> or not.
When the caster is <color=#7AB2FF>Invisible</color>, all Lightning Slice in your hand become Orbital Slash, otherwise all Orbital Slash in your hand become Lightning Slice.
skill_description_12300096: Blends into the shadow and becomes <color=#7AB2FF>Invisible</color> for 5 seconds.\nIf this character is already <color=#7AB2FF>Invisible</color>, retrieves up to #r Red cards from the discard pile to your hand.
skill_description_12300097: Unleashes the Lightning Slice, dealing damage to enemies over 8 hits and inflicting <color=#FF6666>Rend</color> on them.\nUnleashes the Orbital Slash, dealing damage to enemies once and inflicting <color=#FF6666>Slash</color> on them.

skill_description_12300100: Launches the Mindbender Shot, dealing damage to all enemies over 5 hits. In addition, inflicts <color=#B383FF>Confusion</color> on them and reducing their Defense by #r. This effect stacks.\nAfter use, generates a Black card 'Heartburning Embers' in your hand.

skill_description_12300101: Releases an Autonomous Mine that walks slowly toward enemies.\nThe Autonomous Mine is Explosive and will explode in 10 seconds, dealing damage to enemies within a small area once and triggering <color=#FFB800>Thunderfall</color>. When it explodes, you draw a card.
skill_description_12300103: Releases 3 Autonomous Mines that walk slowly toward enemies. If you don't have a Big Red Button in your hand, adds a Big Red Button from the deck or discard pile to your hand.\nThe Autonomous Mine is Explosive and will explode in 10 seconds, dealing damage to enemies within a small area once and triggering <color=#FFB800>Thunderfall</color>. When it explodes, you draw a card.
skill_description_12300107: Shoots a pulse arrow, dealing damage to the target once. The arrow <color=#FF6666>Ricochets</color> between enemies and <color=#FFB800>Electrifies</color> them.
skill_description_12300108:
Draws a card.
If it is a Red or Purple card, activates Teddy Dale: Attack Mode.
If it is a Blue or Green card, activates Teddy Dale: Defense Mode.
If it is a Yellow or Black card, keep drawing cards until either mode is activated.

Each shockwave deals damage to all enemies once.\nShockwaves are considered Waves.

skill_description_12300300:
Enter the snipe mode for #r seconds.
During this period, this character gains <color=#7AB2FF>Poise</color>.
Whenever a Red card is used, launches a sniping shot that deals damage to an enemy once and <color=#FF6666>Penetrates</color> the target.
While Lock-on Sniping is in effect, using additional Lock-on Sniping will make the Tactical Dog unleash #r Tactical Missiles, dealing damage to locked enemies over #r strikes.
Tactical Missiles are considered Explosive.
Tactical Dog is considered a Mechanical Unit.

skill_description_12300308: 'All out!' Increases all allies' Normal Attack Speed to the maximum for 10 seconds. During this period, all Assault Commandos' normal attacks are switched to Onslaught Mode. In the Onslaught Mode, all Assault Commandos' weapons are switched to burst mode, firing twice the number of projectiles. Assault Commandos include Shizuru, Karen, and Julian.

Upon impact, Legge Bomber deploys a Chained Lightning.
Zone Lock: Redirects normal attacks to enemies within the newly selected area.

Special Effect: Elemental Harmonization.
When you cast Shadowcraft, Element Core: Lightning, Element Core: Fire, and Element Core: Frost on the Aether Obelisk in that specific order, generates a Philosopher's Stone in your hand.

skill_description_12301241: <color=#FF6666>Ignition</color>, <color=#FF6666>Searing Earth</color>, <color=#FF6666>Prairie Blaze</color>, and <color=#FF6666>Sea of Fire</color> inflicted by this character deal 25% more burning damage per second. This effect stacks.
skill_description_12301682: Al allies have a 5% better chance to <color=#FFB800>Electrify</color> the target.
skill_description_12301621:
献祭当前生命值的50%，释放内心的猛兽，使武器【巨噬斧】的攻击范围增大，持续13秒
持续期间触发以下效果：
自身<red>【狂暴】</red>
自身红卡造成的伤害提高100%
持续【销毁】手牌中的所有黑卡和【暗艺】，每【销毁】1张，自身红卡造成的伤害提高50%
同时从牌库或弃牌区将2张【血吼】加入手牌
使用后【血噬】转化为【血之冠】
skill_leaderCardConditionDesc_12301621: 冷却时间30秒，每使用1张红卡/黄卡/紫卡/绿卡，冷却缩短5秒；每【销毁】1张黑卡或【暗艺】，冷却缩短5秒
skill_description_12301685:
Consumes 50% of the current HP and launches a mighty strike, dealing damage to enemies once and inflicting <color=#FF6666>Slash</color>.
Summons a swarm of black thorns from the blood pool, draining HP from enemies and <color=#B383FF>Imprisoning</color> them.
Generates a Reverengy in your hand.
After use, Blood Crown becomes Blooddevour.

skill_detailDescription_12300668: Damage: P.U.S. 700% (Physical) × 7. Single Shot: 600% (Physical) x 6. Motor Explosion: 2500% (Physical) × 1.
skill_description_12301716:
Anfiya releases Snowshade.
Snowshade swallows all enemies for #r seconds.
During this period, all damage taken by Snowshade is transferred to the entire enemy team.
At the end of the duration, deals damage to all enemies once based on the number of attacks taken by Snowshade.
skill_leaderCardConditionDesc_12301716: Cooldown: 40 seconds. Whenever you obtain a Purple card or this character's skill card, reduces the cooldown by 4 seconds.
skill_description_12301717: Playing a Green card with a cost of 2 or more restores 0.5 Mana.
skill_description_12301743: Upon using a 2-cost or higher <color=#B383FF>Fetter</color> card, reduces a random enemy's Attack by 1%, up to a maximum of 15%.\nUpon using a 2-cost or higher <color=#B383FF>Imprisonment</color> card, reduces a random enemy's Defense by 1%, up to a maximum of 15%.
skill_description_12301744: All allies take 30% less final damage for the first 15 seconds of each combat. This effect stacks.
skill_description_12301749: Anfiya helps Snowshade in analysis tasks.\nSelect a Reconstructed: Swim Scale, Reconstructed: Dusk Direphant, or Reconstructed: Glacial Bone Dragon and add it to your hand.\nThis card is Destroyed when played.
skill_description_12301750: Draws a card.\nIf it is a Purple card, retrieves a card from the discard pile to your hand every 5 seconds, triggered up to #r times.\nIf it is not a Purple Card, draws a card every 5 seconds, triggered up to #r times.
skill_description_12301751:
Snowshade imitates Swim Scale.
Grants Sandbone Armor to all frontline allies for 6 seconds.
All affected allies gain <color=#FF6666>Berserk</color> and take 80% less damage.
In addition, each of their attacks restores 0.1 Mana.
skill_description_12301753: Snowshade imitates Glacial Bone Dragon.\n<color=#B383FF>Fetters</color> all enemies and deals damage to them over 5 hits.\nIn addition, <color=#7AB2FF>Chills</color> all affected enemies.
skill_description_12301756:
Fomalhaut smites the target, dealing damage once and <color=#FF6666>Stunning</color> them.
If the target's HP is above 50%, generates a Shadowcraft in your hand.
When this card is discarded by another card's effect, generates a Shadowcraft in your hand.
This card is Destroyed when played or discarded.
skill_description_12301811: Fomalhaut launches a charged swipe, dealing damage to enemies once and inflicting <color=#FF6666>Corruption</color>.\nIn addition, discards a random card in hand, prioritizing The Endless, then generates a Shadowcraft in your hand.\nThis card is Destroyed when played.
skill_description_12301833: Taunts all enemies at the beginning of each battle and gains a 50% chance to <color=#7AB2FF>Block</color> all incoming attacks. Upon <color=#7AB2FF>Blocking</color> an attack, <color=#FFB800>Electrifies</color> the attacker for 20 seconds.
skill_description_12301834:
Draws a card.
If the cost is odd, all normal attacks launch an additional projectile, lasting for 10 attacks.
In addition, the water gun enters Burst Mode for 6 seconds. During this period, normal attacks launch doubled projectiles.
In addition, normal attacks will target the selected enemy.
skill_description_12301835:
Draws 2 cards.
For each Red card drawn, increases all allies' Attack by #r. This effect stacks.
For each Blue card drawn, increases all allies' Defense by #r. This effect stacks.
For each Yellow card drawn, draws a card.
skill_description_12301836: Enhances normal attacks:\nFor the next 10 seconds, normal attacks release Streaming Shadows equal to the number of projectiles. Each Streaming Shadow deals damage once to a random enemy and has a 50% chance to <color=#7AB2FF>Chill</color> the target.\nStream Shadows deal damage equal to ×#r of normal attacks.
skill_detailDescription_12301836: Damage: 3 × number of normal attack damage (Ice).
skill_description_12301837:
将所有手牌洗入牌库
基于记录中的费用修正当前费用
基于记录的手牌数量抽取等量的牌
基于记录的生命值回复我方生命值
使用后【销毁】
skill_description_12301838:
Draws a card.
If the cost is odd, all normal attacks launch an additional projectile, lasting for 10 attacks.
If the cost is even, all allies' normal attacks deal #r more damage, lasting for 10 attacks.
In addition, the water gun enters Burst Mode for 6 seconds. During this period, normal attacks launch doubled projectiles.
In addition, normal attacks will target the selected enemy.
skill_description_12301840:
Draws 2 cards.
For each Red card drawn, increases all allies' Attack by #r. This effect stacks.
For each Blue card drawn, increases all allies' Defense by #r. This effect stacks.
For each Yellow card drawn, draws a card.
For each Green card drawn, retrieves a card.
For each Purple card drawn, restores 1 Mana.
skill_description_12301839:
Draws a card.
If the cost is odd, all normal attacks launch an additional projectile, lasting for 10 attacks.
If the cost is even, all allies' normal attacks deal #r more damage, lasting for 10 attacks.
In addition, the water gun enters Burst Mode for 6 seconds. During this period, normal attacks launch doubled projectiles.
In addition, normal attacks will target the selected enemy.
When attacking allies, each projectile from normal attacks heals the target for #r of Max HP and dispels <color=#FF6666>Ignition</color>.
skill_description_12301870: <color=#B383FF>Sleeping</color> inflicted by this character lasts for 1 second longer. This effect stacks.
skill_description_12301878: <color=#B383FF>Fetters</color> all enemies at the beginning of each battle.
skill_description_12301879: <color=#B383FF>Imprisons</color> all enemies at the beginning of each battle.
skill_description_12301880: All frontline allies gain immunity to <color=#FF6666>Interruption</color>.
skill_description_12301881: All allies take 5% less final damage.
skill_description_12301924:
Doppelganger channels the power of chaos.
Triggers the following effects for up to 3 times.
Upon using a Purple card, unleashes a powerful psychic strike that deals damage once and inflicts <color=#B383FF>Confusion</color>. In addition, reduces the target's Attack by 2% and increases this character's Attack by 2%. This effect stacks.
When this card is used, it counts as one use.
skill_description_12301925: Draws cards until your hand is full.
skill_description_12301926:
Jalhay and Doppelganger unleash a powerful psychic storm, dealing damage to all enemies over 5 hits and <color=#B383FF>Cursing</color> them.
In addition, triggers the following effects for up to 3 times.
Using a Red card generates an Emotion: Fury in your hand.
Using a Yellow card generates an Emotion: Joy in your hand.
Using a Blue or Green card generates an Emotion: Calmness in your hand.
skill_description_12301930: Jalhay targets the selected enemy, dealing damage over 5 hits and drawing a card.\nThis card is Destroyed when played.
skill_description_12301931: Jalhay targets the selected enemy, dealing damage over 10 hits and gaining <color=#FF6666>Berserk</color>.\nThis card is Destroyed when played.
skill_description_12301934: Marks an ally and heals them for #r of their Max HP per second for #r seconds.\nDuring this period, the affected ally takes #r less damage.\nNormal attacks will heal the marked ally.
skill_description_12301935: Heals an ally for #r of their Max HP.\nRemoves crowd-control and damage-over-time effects from the target.\nAfter using this card, draws an Induced Awakening from the deck.
skill_description_12301936: Signs a Covenant of Life for #r seconds.\nDuring this period, whenever an ally takes fatal damage, heals them for #r of their Max HP at a cost of #r of this character's current HP.\nWhenever this effect is triggered, retrieves a Perception Intervention from your deck or discard pile to your hand.
skill_leaderCardConditionDesc_12301936: Use the Discard action to discard cards once.
skill_description_12301939:
Marks an ally and heals them for #r of their Max HP per second for #r seconds.
During this period, the affected ally takes #r less damage.
Normal attacks will heal the marked ally.
The marked ally's next card played costs 1 less Mana.
skill_description_12301944:
Heals an ally for #r of their Max HP.
Removes crowd-control and damage-over-time effects from the target.
After using this card, draws an Induced Awakening from the deck.
If the target's HP is above 30%, increases their Attack by 2%. This effect stacks.
If the target's HP is below 30%, increases their Defense by 2%. This effect stacks.

【伴生体】感知混沌，使敌方全体受到的混响/负能伤害增加20%，持续12秒

使用紫卡时，获得10点精力值，释放强大的精神攻击对敌方目标造成1段伤害并<color=#B383FF>【混乱】</color>，同时使敌方目标攻击力下降2%，使自身攻击力+2%，可叠加

skill_description_12301960: Deals damage to all enemies once and inflicts <color=#FF6666>Slash</color>.\nPlays all Disaster Moon in the discard pile.
skill_description_12301862:
A-1SO deploys the Iron Curtain and protects all allies. Iron Curtain's durability is equal to #r of Paladi's Max HP.
While Iron Curtain is activated, this character's normal attacks restore the Iron Curtain's durability #r instead.
Iron Curtain's Defense is equal to Paladi's Defense. Only 1 Iron Curtain can exist on the battlefield at one time.
A-1SO is considered a Mechanical Unit.
skill_description_12301863: 【A-1SO】朝地面喷射汽油并点火，使敌方场地触发<red>【燎原】</red>并使敌方全体【精力值】下降#r\n同时使敌方全体攻击力下降#r\n【A-1SO】为【机械单位】
skill_description_12301961:
Paladi blows her whistle, ordering her robots to suppress the enemies.
A-1SO releases a sonic beam that strikes all enemies over 8 hits and <color=#FF6666>Stuns</color> them.
A-2SO unleashes a high-voltage electric current that strikes all enemies over 8 hits and <color=#FFB800>Electrifies</color> them.
A-1SO and A-2SO are considered Mechanical Units.
A-1SO's sonic beam is considered a Wave.

skill_description_12302038:
Generates #r powerful EM fields for #r seconds.
Duration:
Whenever any character (allies and foes alike) inflicts <color=#FFB800>Electrification</color> #r times, the EM field gains #r Volt Value.

Volt Value always accumulates and does not decay.
EM waves are considered Waves.

Marks an ally and heals them for 5% of their Max HP per second for 6 seconds.
During this period, the affected ally takes 50% less damage.
Normal attacks will heal the marked ally.
The marked ally's next card played costs 1 less Mana.
talent_desc_12800006: While the Covenant of Life is active, all allies receive doubled healing.\nWhile the Covenant of Life is active, if this character takes fatal damage, nullifies the damage and gains <color=#7AB2FF>Invulnerability</color> for 3 seconds. In addition, generates a Black card 'Reverengy' to your deck.
talent_desc_12800014: When the allied marked by Perception Intervention is attacked, retrieves an Induced Awakening from your deck or discard pile to your hand. This effect can be triggered once every 10 seconds.
talent_desc_12800018: While Iron Curtain exists, Paladi gains <color=#7AB2FF>Poise</color> and grants all frontline allies immunity to <color=#FF6666>Interrupt</color> and <color=#FF6666>Stun</color>.
talent_desc_12800022: Enhances Fire Wall: A-1SO sprays gasoline onto the ground and set it on fire, inflicting <color=#FF6666>Prairie Blaze</color> on the enemy battlefield and reducing all enemies' Energy by 3%.\nIn addition, reduces all enemies' Attack and Defense by 2%.
talent_desc_12800026: When Iron Curtain is breached, immediately plays Fire Wall.\nIn addition, increases all allies' Defense by 3%. This effect stacks.
talent_desc_12800033: After Paladi uses Riot Suppression, A-2SO releases a barrage of bullets on random enemies over 6 hits.\nIn addition, an additional A-2SO robot will participate in the next Riot Suppression, offering normal attacks as auxiliary support, with a maximum of 4 extra robots.
talent_desc_12800095: Enhances Magnet Bait:\nUpon using the next Red or Orange <color=#FFB800>Electrification</color> card, immediately adds 3 <color=#FFB800>Electrification</color> cards from the deck or discard pile to your hand.\nAfter that, your next Red or Orange <color=#FFB800>Electrification</color> card deal 100% more damage. This effect can only be triggered once.
talent_desc_12800098: Magnet Trap and EM Field last for 2 seconds longer.
talent_desc_12800101: For every 100,000 Volt Value accumulated, adds a Mega Volt to your hand.\nFor every 1,000,000 Volt Value accumulated, adds a Giga Volt to the top of your deck.
talent_desc_12800106: When Magnet Trap disappears, grants the ally with the lowest HP a Magnetic Shield. The shield is equal to 2000% of this character's Defense and lasts for 10 seconds.\nThe shielded ally takes 50% less EM damage.
equip_des_11800028: A high-powered revolver for hunting large monsters, difficult for ordinary people to handle.
equip_Getway_11800028_4_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line - Blastcall Matriarch
equip_Getway_11800028_5_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Chillwave Airbladder
equip_des_11800030: A rock from the chaos space, with extremely high hardness, perfect for delivering the final blow to opponents.
equip_Getway_11800030_0_DisplayName: Shoggolith City C.R.B.S.E. Agency Bounty Quest
equip_Getway_11800030_1_DisplayName: Mander Mine C.R.B.S.E. Agency Bounty Quest
equip_Getway_11800030_4_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line - Blastcall Matriarch
equip_Getway_11800030_5_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Chillwave Airbladder
equip_des_11800032: Technology from the Citadel, magic from the Empire, mediation from the EU. The three major powers serve this weapon. The user gains combat experience from the three major powers, becoming more courageous with each combat.\n[This equipment is unique.]
equip_des_11800034: A mysterious technological artifact from a world without morphic resonance. After simple repairs by EU technology, it emits a mysterious signal, but attempts at reverse engineering have failed. Its design does not conform to the laws of physics in this world, but occasionally receives messages from another world. That world seems to be aware of our existence and is observing us.\n[This equipment is unique.]
equip_des_11800043: Bonfire City Railways League's standard military equipment. When soldiers run out of ammunition, at least this knife can still be relied upon.
equip_Getway_11800043_4_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line - Blastcall Matriarch
equip_Getway_11800043_5_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Chillwave Airbladder
equip_des_11800044: A portable ration with a unique taste, it quickly replenishes the energy lost by the consumer after defeating enemies.
equip_Getway_11800044_4_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line - Blastcall Matriarch
equip_Getway_11800044_5_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Chillwave Airbladder
equip_des_11800045: A former superpower weapon developed using nuclear technology listed in the '109 Dangerous Technologies That Could Destroy the World' by the Citadel. It can self-charge rapidly. Its data and other replicas have been retrieved and destroyed by the Citadel.\n[This equipment is unique.]
equip_des_11800046: A concentrated functional beverage with a unique taste, it quickly replenishes the energy lost by the consumer after defeating enemies.
equip_Getway_11800046_4_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line - Blastcall Matriarch
equip_Getway_11800046_5_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Chillwave Airbladder
equip_des_11800047: A component attached to grenades, enhancing their explosive power when detonated.
equip_Getway_11800047_4_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line - Blastcall Matriarch
equip_Getway_11800047_5_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Chillwave Airbladder
equip_des_11800048: Wearing this material, individuals can maintain a morphic field similar to a Deep Sleeper, enabling more efficient energy utilization when releasing energy-consuming abilities.\n[This equipment is unique.]
equip_des_11800096: Used by a legendary veteran, her morphic field influences this weapon, gradually making the user as valiant and skilled in combat as she is.
equip_Getway_11800096_4_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line - Blastcall Matriarch
equip_Getway_11800096_5_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Chillwave Airbladder
equip_des_11800098: Used by a sturdy lumberjack, his morphic field influences this tool, gradually making the user as robust and agile as he is.
equip_Getway_11800098_4_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line - Blastcall Matriarch
equip_Getway_11800098_5_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Chillwave Airbladder
equip_des_11800102: A former superpower armor. When the target loses vital signs, it can obtain a stable human body structure's morphic field from the opponent.
equip_Getway_11800102_4_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line - Blastcall Matriarch
equip_Getway_11800102_5_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Chillwave Airbladder
equip_des_11800103: Utilizes morphic field technology to recover energy on the battlefield for personal equipment use.
equip_Getway_11800103_4_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line - Blastcall Matriarch
equip_Getway_11800103_5_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Chillwave Airbladder
equip_des_11800104: Produced by the EU from an unknown timeline, anyone who uses it feels comfortable and agile in combat.
equip_Getway_11800104_0_DisplayName: Shoggolith City C.R.B.S.E. Agency Bounty Quest
equip_Getway_11800104_1_DisplayName: Mander Mine C.R.B.S.E. Agency Bounty Quest
equip_Getway_11800104_4_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line - Blastcall Matriarch
equip_Getway_11800104_5_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Chillwave Airbladder
equip_des_11800105: Armor made of Degenerate Blackstone. Extremely hard armor that can save lives in critical moments.
equip_Getway_11800105_0_DisplayName: Shoggolith City C.R.B.S.E. Agency Bounty Quest
equip_Getway_11800105_1_DisplayName: Mander Mine C.R.B.S.E. Agency Bounty Quest
equip_Getway_11800105_4_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line - Blastcall Matriarch
equip_Getway_11800105_5_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Chillwave Airbladder
equip_des_11800106: Surgical tool made with the abilities of an Ascender medic. Allows ordinary individuals without medical knowledge to perform emergency surgery on the battlefield.
equip_Getway_11800106_0_DisplayName: Shoggolith City C.R.B.S.E. Agency Bounty Quest
equip_Getway_11800106_1_DisplayName: Mander Mine C.R.B.S.E. Agency Bounty Quest
equip_Getway_11800106_4_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line - Blastcall Matriarch
equip_Getway_11800106_5_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Chillwave Airbladder
equip_des_11800107: Equipped with a lifesign detection function, it automatically injects adrenaline to the wearer's wounds when life-threatening situations occur, temporarily uplifting their spirits and making their movements more agile.
equip_Getway_11800107_4_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line - Blastcall Matriarch
equip_Getway_11800107_5_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Chillwave Airbladder
equip_des_11800035: A small pistol developed by Anita Technologies in the past, specifically for use in harsh environments. It's sturdy, portable, and capable of rapid firing.
equip_Getway_11800035_3_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Chillwave Airbladder
equip_Getway_11800035_4_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Glacial Bone Dragon
equip_des_11800036: How to impart acceleration to objects has long been a subject of study for the Citadel. Over the years, the Citadel has designed numerous devices, large and small, for this purpose. This device is widely regarded as simple, efficient, and easy to produce. Of course, it can also be used as a weapon, as any moving object requires external force to stop.
equip_Getway_11800036_2_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Glacial Bone Dragon
equip_Getway_11800036_3_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Chaos-Infused Stone Fungus
equip_des_11800037: A staff used by apprentice mages of the Empire.
equip_Getway_11800037_1_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Dusk Direphant
equip_des_11800038: Used by Executors of the Night Chains, coated with potent poison.
equip_Getway_11800038_2_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Dust Resonating Phosphor
equip_Getway_11800038_3_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Dusk Direphant
equip_Getway_11800038_4_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Chaos-Infused Stone Fungus
equip_des_11800039: Carried by the Gardener for various tasks, initially developed by pioneer gardeners exploring the chaos space, it has been improved over time to include welding, cutting, and combat functions. To prevent accidental injuries, it must be stored in a wooden storage box when not in use.
equip_Getway_11800039_3_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Chillwave Airbladder
equip_Getway_11800039_4_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Glacial Bone Dragon
equip_des_11800237: A coating that can adhere to any surface, known for its lightweight and heat-resistant properties, originally developed as a coating material for spacecraft. Now widely used in Anita's protective suits, equipment, and vehicles, it enhances the defensive capabilities of the objects it covers.
equip_Getway_11800237_3_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Chillwave Airbladder
equip_Getway_11800237_4_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Glacial Bone Dragon
equip_des_11800238: Worn on the chest, it activates a special morphic field to protect the wearer from harm when their life signs are detected to be weakening.
equip_Getway_11800238_3_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Chillwave Airbladder
equip_Getway_11800238_4_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Glacial Bone Dragon
equip_des_11800239: Weapon designed by Anita. Increases the chance of summoning lightning, although it cannot output full power due to a lack of grounding conductors. But isn't the user's body an excellent conductor? Just make sure not to cause any step voltage situations.
equip_Getway_11800239_3_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Chillwave Airbladder
equip_Getway_11800239_4_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Glacial Bone Dragon
equip_des_11800240: Used by the Gardener to harvest organs from Chaos Remains to create Chaos Stone equipment, it efficiently recovers energy. Chaos Remains scientists assure that as Chaos Remains lack the neural structure of Earth organisms, they do not experience any pain during the organ harvesting process.
equip_Getway_11800240_0_DisplayName: 商城-列车长上任装备礼包
equip_Getway_11800240_4_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Chillwave Airbladder
equip_des_11800241: Non-physical fibers woven from pure morphic field. Stabilizes the structure of objects it covers, maintaining stability and minimizing damage or worse consequences as much as possible.
equip_Getway_11800241_3_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Chillwave Airbladder
equip_Getway_11800241_4_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Glacial Bone Dragon
equip_des_11800242: Equipped with the Anita command system, it coordinates the efficiency of surrounding drones' operations.
equip_Getway_11800242_3_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Chillwave Airbladder
equip_Getway_11800242_4_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Glacial Bone Dragon
equip_des_11800243: Second-type perpetual motion machine made with Chaos Stone. A violation of physical laws, also a technology for cooling the reality stabilizer. The higher the machine's power, the colder it becomes.
equip_Getway_11800243_0_DisplayName: Freeport Ⅶ C.R.B.S.E. Agency Bounty Quest
equip_Getway_11800243_2_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Chillwave Airbladder
equip_Getway_11800243_3_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Glacial Bone Dragon
equip_des_11800244: Second-type perpetual motion machine made with Chaos Stone. A violation of physical laws, if not supplied with a large amount of energy to sustain it, it will continuously absorb heat from the environment until it melts itself.
equip_Getway_11800244_0_DisplayName: Freeport Ⅶ C.R.B.S.E. Agency Bounty Quest
equip_Getway_11800244_2_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Chillwave Airbladder
equip_Getway_11800244_3_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Glacial Bone Dragon
equip_des_11800245: Experimental product of Anita's attempt to decipher ancient artifacts. Although it did not achieve the goal of restoration, Anita successfully produced this almost indestructible armor material. When activated, its surface reflects light similar to that of the distant stars.
equip_Getway_11800245_0_DisplayName: 商城-列车长上任装备礼包
equip_Getway_11800245_1_DisplayName: Freeport Ⅶ C.R.B.S.E. Agency Bounty Quest
equip_Getway_11800245_3_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Chillwave Airbladder
equip_des_11800246: A drone with a monopole magnetic core made from Chaos Stone, capable of charging all surrounding drones.
equip_Getway_11800246_0_DisplayName: Freeport Ⅶ C.R.B.S.E. Agency Bounty Quest
equip_Getway_11800246_2_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Chillwave Airbladder
equip_Getway_11800246_3_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Glacial Bone Dragon
equip_des_11800247: This prototype is the outcome of Anita's efforts to analyze a technological creation of unknown origin from the chaos space. Under specific resonance conditions, it can emit a unique energy beam capable of eradicating either a portion or the entirety of its target's existence.\n[This equipment is unique.]
equip_des_11800248: Originally an Anita spatial locater, this device underwent anomalies that led to its modification into a spear. It serves the purpose of summoning supplies whenever and wherever necessary. Occasionally, it summons items bearing the Anita logo, despite never having been manufactured.\n[This equipment is unique.]
equip_Getway_11800248_0_DisplayName: Anita Launch Center Reputation Level 15 Rewards
equip_des_11800249: Equipment made from advanced varietal Chaos Remains' brain. Worn behind the head, it allows the user's brainwaves to temporarily mimic hive mind thinking. Anita created this equipment primarily to facilitate the coordination of numerous drones.\n[This equipment is unique.]
equip_des_11800250: Experimental product from the Citadel's attempt to enter the civilian market. After shaking, the tip emits crackling sounds and flashes. It has caused several terrible accidents leading to its discontinuation.
equip_Getway_11800250_2_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Glacial Bone Dragon
equip_Getway_11800250_3_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Chaos-Infused Stone Fungus
equip_des_11800251: Some protective materials commonly used in dangerous laboratory experiments by the Citadel, lightweight and sturdy. There's a chance it can withstand external damage during critical moments.
equip_Getway_11800251_2_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Glacial Bone Dragon
equip_Getway_11800251_3_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Chaos-Infused Stone Fungus
equip_des_11800252: Used by scholars to stimulate the brain to maintain focus, but it has some side effects and should be used with caution.
equip_Getway_11800252_2_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Glacial Bone Dragon
equip_Getway_11800252_3_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Chaos-Infused Stone Fungus
equip_des_11800253: One of the many weapons created by the Defense Nexus, it appears as simple and effective as magic to those unfamiliar with its principles. By simply lifting the box accompanied by a dazzling light, it can effortlessly crush concrete walls and pierce through armor plates. However, the intense light is unnecessary in its principle, designed only to increase deterrence.
equip_Getway_11800253_2_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Glacial Bone Dragon
equip_Getway_11800253_3_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Chaos-Infused Stone Fungus
equip_des_11800254: Used to dissect Chaos Remains, capable of tearing apart most synthetic materials or cutting through the skin and scales of large Chaos Remains.
equip_Getway_11800254_2_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Glacial Bone Dragon
equip_Getway_11800254_3_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Chaos-Infused Stone Fungus
equip_des_11800255: This armor material, created by the School of Hazard Avoidance, has excellent protective properties and can absorb energy to accelerate cellular healing.
equip_Getway_11800255_2_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Glacial Bone Dragon
equip_Getway_11800255_3_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Chaos-Infused Stone Fungus
equip_des_11800256: Capable of extracting information from the environment and efficiently transmitting it to the user, it can help the user speed up intelligence processing during combat.
equip_Getway_11800256_2_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Glacial Bone Dragon
equip_Getway_11800256_3_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Chaos-Infused Stone Fungus
equip_des_11800257: A weapon of unknown principles, no one can predict the outcome it will lead the user to.
equip_Getway_11800257_0_DisplayName: Cape City C.R.B.S.E. Agency Bounty Quest
equip_Getway_11800257_2_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Glacial Bone Dragon
equip_Getway_11800257_3_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Chaos-Infused Stone Fungus
equip_des_11800258: Weapon carried by mysterious entities patrolling the Written Maze. Humans know little about this entity and the origin of this weapon.
equip_Getway_11800258_0_DisplayName: Cape City C.R.B.S.E. Agency Bounty Quest
equip_Getway_11800258_2_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Glacial Bone Dragon
equip_Getway_11800258_3_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Chaos-Infused Stone Fungus
equip_des_11800259: This material is merely a projection of a hyper-dimensional object into three-dimensional space, allowing it to change its structure like programming, making it an almost universal substance.
equip_Getway_11800259_0_DisplayName: Cape City C.R.B.S.E. Agency Bounty Quest
equip_Getway_11800259_2_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Glacial Bone Dragon
equip_Getway_11800259_3_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Chaos-Infused Stone Fungus
equip_des_11800260: Used to analyze the internal structure of targets from higher dimensions and change functions rapidly.
equip_Getway_11800260_0_DisplayName: Cape City C.R.B.S.E. Agency Bounty Quest
equip_Getway_11800260_2_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Glacial Bone Dragon
equip_Getway_11800260_3_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Chaos-Infused Stone Fungus
equip_des_11800262: Capable of interfering with timelines, nicknamed the 'Regret Potion,' it offers the user an extra chance to make a choice from an alternate timeline, but the user must pay a corresponding price.\n[This equipment is unique.]
equip_des_11800263: In countless timelines, there is always a future where 'you' are alive. Wearing this armor made of fabric, you can ensure you reach that safe node unscathed.\n[This equipment is unique.]
equip_des_11800264: The portable version of Haima's Dice, capable of freely changing the rules of reality around.\n[This equipment is unique.]
equip_des_11800265: Weapon commonly used by Empire soldiers.
equip_Getway_11800265_1_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Dusk Direphant
equip_des_11800266: Armor commonly used by Empire soldiers.
equip_Getway_11800266_1_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Dusk Direphant
equip_des_11800267: Emblem with a cute cat pattern. Attached with magical abilities, it can extend the duration of some special transformation spells, albeit with weak energy. Perhaps it was created by an Empire mage on a whim.
equip_Getway_11800267_1_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Dusk Direphant
equip_des_11800268: Wand reverse-engineered from the magical echoes of the second wish made by the ancestors of the Mandus Empire at the Wishing Tower. It is said that just as the sun emerged from the top of the Wishing Tower, this wand can produce intense flashes capable of blinding and burning.
equip_Getway_11800268_1_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Dusk Direphant
equip_des_11800269: Dagger crafted by underground sorcerers seeking stars in the absence of the starry sky, based on the second wish made by the Empire's ancestors at the Wishing Tower. This wish brought life to the Mandus Garden. The dagger shines with the gentle light of distant stars and can heal the wounds of the wearer.
equip_Getway_11800269_1_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Dusk Direphant
equip_des_11800270: True starlight from the chaos world — those twinkling sparks
equip_Getway_11800270_1_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Dusk Direphant
equip_des_11800271: Emblem engraved with a lion pattern, a testament to the bravery of warriors.
equip_Getway_11800271_1_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Dusk Direphant
equip_des_11800272: Result of the conflict between the two schools of the Empire Magic Academy, where one believes that Strange Sparks are the most powerful magic. If used by a talented individual capable of unleashing Strange Sparks, it can unleash even greater power.
equip_Getway_11800272_1_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Dusk Direphant
equip_des_11800273: Result of the conflict between the two schools of the Empire Magic Academy, where one believes that Shadowcraft is the pinnacle of magic. If used by a talented individual capable of unleashing Shadowcraft, it can unleash even greater power.
equip_Getway_11800273_1_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Dusk Direphant
equip_des_11800274: Harnessing the vitality brought by the Wishing Tower into the armor.
equip_Getway_11800274_1_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Dusk Direphant
equip_des_11800275: Material Extracted from the artificial sun atop the Wishing Tower.
equip_Getway_11800275_1_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Dusk Direphant
equip_des_11800276: If outer space is infinite, then large things can also become infinitely small. This concept is applied to create a staff, which compresses magic that would normally require a large volume into a very small one. It serves as a much more powerful mana container than the human body. The user can easily unleash extremely powerful magic.\n[This equipment is unique.]
equip_des_11800280: A conveniently concealable sharp blade that is difficult to detect by conventional scans, the preferred choice for clandestine operations.
equip_Getway_11800280_2_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Dust Resonating Phosphor
equip_Getway_11800280_3_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Dusk Direphant
equip_Getway_11800280_4_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Chaos-Infused Stone Fungus
equip_des_11800281: Equipment designed for special missions among civilians, featuring unique, stylish lines that exude elegance and carefully selected materials that hint at understated luxury. Oh, and it's bulletproof too.
equip_Getway_11800281_2_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Dust Resonating Phosphor
equip_Getway_11800281_3_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Dusk Direphant
equip_Getway_11800281_4_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Chaos-Infused Stone Fungus
equip_des_11800282: Smoke Bomb commonly used by Night Chains operatives, capable of helping the user move in and out like a ninja, and more importantly, it looks cool, adopting the same design philosophy as the Spring Fashion Show this year, embodying the designer's... For more, see Issue 208 of 'Night Chains Fashion Trends.'
equip_Getway_11800282_2_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Dust Resonating Phosphor
equip_Getway_11800282_3_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Dusk Direphant
equip_Getway_11800282_4_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Chaos-Infused Stone Fungus
equip_des_11800283: A compact and foldable sniper rifle, not only powerful but also impeccably designed. Its exquisite and elegant design makes it versatile without losing its sophistication. The designer's pursuit of stylish aesthetics is evident in every detail.
equip_Getway_11800283_2_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Dust Resonating Phosphor
equip_Getway_11800283_3_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Dusk Direphant
equip_Getway_11800283_4_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Chaos-Infused Stone Fungus
equip_des_11800284: A cane sword used by elite Night Chains operatives, it won fourth place in the annual favorite items awards within Night Chains. Its sleek and understated design makes it irresistible, and its lightweight nature allows the user to wield it with ease and style in combat. While its sharpness is unquestionable, that's not what draws most people's attention.
equip_Getway_11800284_2_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Dust Resonating Phosphor
equip_Getway_11800284_3_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Dusk Direphant
equip_Getway_11800284_4_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Chaos-Infused Stone Fungus
equip_des_11800285: A special equipment used by Night Chains executors, capable of temporarily rendering oneself invisible in critical situations.
equip_Getway_11800285_2_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Dust Resonating Phosphor
equip_Getway_11800285_3_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Dusk Direphant
equip_Getway_11800285_4_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Chaos-Infused Stone Fungus
equip_des_11800286: Autonomous drones developed by Night Chains, featuring long endurance, capable of automatically sniping enemies on the battlefield.
equip_Getway_11800286_2_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Dust Resonating Phosphor
equip_Getway_11800286_3_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Dusk Direphant
equip_Getway_11800286_4_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Chaos-Infused Stone Fungus
equip_Getway_11800287_1_DisplayName: 澄明数据中心铁安局悬赏任务
equip_Getway_11800287_3_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Dust Resonating Phosphor
equip_Getway_11800287_4_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Dusk Direphant
equip_des_11800288: A dagger perfect for stealthy operations, when combined with the smoke bombs commonly used by Night Chains, the last thing the enemy sees is a flash of cold light. Some may expect to hear more praises about it, but not everyone appreciates that kind of exaggerated rhetoric.
equip_Getway_11800288_2_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Dust Resonating Phosphor
equip_Getway_11800288_3_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Dusk Direphant
equip_Getway_11800288_4_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Chaos-Infused Stone Fungus
equip_des_11800289: Power mecha material assisted in combat by AI, with each pattern on the armor plates handcrafted by artisans, meticulously drawn stroke by stroke, showcasing elegance from the details. It provides all-around protection for the wearer, with AI taking over actions when necessary, ensuring that even in situations of unconsciousness, the wearer can continue to fight and maintain a regal demeanor.
equip_Getway_11800289_2_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Dust Resonating Phosphor
equip_Getway_11800289_3_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Dusk Direphant
equip_Getway_11800289_4_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Chaos-Infused Stone Fungus
equip_des_11800290: A subprogram of the Night Chains super AI, capable of predicting the outcomes of events in advance and providing contingency plans, allowing the user to better cope with upcoming combats.
equip_Getway_11800290_2_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Dust Resonating Phosphor
equip_Getway_11800290_3_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Dusk Direphant
equip_Getway_11800290_4_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Chaos-Infused Stone Fungus
equip_des_11800291: Highly automated, freeing you from tedious operations and allowing you to act stealthily. The invisibility function ensures covert operations, helping you to take enemies by surprise. With a 20-meter effective range, it captures everything you want to seize. The Heavenly Moon Lock, a thoughtful chain dart, binds enemies and seizes the moment.\n[This equipment is unique.]
equip_des_11800292: A short sword with teleportation technology, allowing the user's movements to be as swift as lightning. In this high-speed state, the time dilation caused by the theory of relativity greatly enhances the user's reaction speed.\n[This equipment is unique.]
equip_Getway_11800292_0_DisplayName: The Fortress City – City Reputation Level 15 Rewards
equip_des_11800293: Energy armor designed by a super AI. Selected faux wood materials create a calm and elegant charm, with natural style patterns adding texture. When activated, it emits swirling blue smoke, creating a serene and distant atmosphere. It can conceal the wearer's form and withstand attacks when traveling, and decorate the space when at home.\n[This equipment is unique.]
equip_des_11800294: The highest authorized symbol of Night Chains, even in offline mode, this device can run 80% of the functions of the super AI, providing users with absolutely correct advice and greatly enhancing intelligence processing and decision-making capabilities.\n[This equipment is unique.]
equip_des_11800295: Space transfer equipment developed by Anita, capable of temporarily phasing the wearer into the phase space to evade attacks. However, it requires the wearer to activate the special morphic field values needed for the equipment to operate when using skills.\n[This equipment is unique.]
equip_des_11800296: A personnel recovery device, also used flexibly by some for movement on the battlefield.\n[This equipment is unique.]
equip_des_11800297: Sometimes, the Citadel accelerates the time of certain objects, and inexplicably, at the end of this process, the mass of these objects mysteriously increases. Scholars have found a practical use for these materials: knocking people unconscious.
equip_Getway_11800297_2_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Glacial Bone Dragon
equip_Getway_11800297_3_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Chaos-Infused Stone Fungus
equip_des_11800298: Limbs of a creature from a certain dream realm, somehow brought into reality.
equip_Getway_11800298_0_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line - Blastcall Matriarch
equip_Getway_11800298_1_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Dust Resonating Phosphor
equip_des_11800299: A magic bow with seven strings, said to shoot arrows that can harm not only the body but also the soul of a person.
equip_Getway_11800299_1_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Dusk Direphant
equip_des_11800300: A weapon used by a swordsmaster of the Northern Front, which releases threads to entangle opponents during combat.
equip_Getway_11800300_0_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line - Blastcall Matriarch
equip_Getway_11800300_1_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Dust Resonating Phosphor
equip_des_11800301: Holding this weapon makes the wielder more aggressive in combat, inflicting more damage on enemies.
equip_Getway_11800301_1_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Dusk Direphant
equip_des_11800302: Holding this weapon intensifies the damage of lightning against enemies, akin to a deity in stories who can control lightning.
equip_Getway_11800302_1_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Dusk Direphant
equip_des_11800303: Holding this weapon intensifies the damage of fire against enemies, resembling a volcano erupting.
equip_Getway_11800303_1_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Dusk Direphant
equip_des_11800304: A portable anti-gravity flight device invented by a civilian scientist, which can indeed reduce weight.
equip_Getway_11800304_1_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line - Blastcall Matriarch
equip_Getway_11800304_2_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Dust Resonating Phosphor
equip_des_11800305: When placed on the head, it can receive the power of teleportation from Delakanalu.
equip_Getway_11800305_1_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line - Blastcall Matriarch
equip_Getway_11800305_2_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Dust Resonating Phosphor
equip_des_11800306: A hat that can shield against psychic control-related ascension abilities.
equip_Getway_11800306_1_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line - Blastcall Matriarch
equip_Getway_11800306_2_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Dust Resonating Phosphor
equip_des_11800307: Upon detecting the wearer losing consciousness, it automatically activates the acupoint pressure function, restoring consciousness.
equip_Getway_11800307_1_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line - Blastcall Matriarch
equip_Getway_11800307_2_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Dust Resonating Phosphor
equip_des_11800308: It can emit a ray that only those who believe in its existence can see, causing the loss of combat will. The more the user believes in its existence, the stronger its effect.
equip_Getway_11800308_1_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line - Blastcall Matriarch
equip_Getway_11800308_2_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Dust Resonating Phosphor
equip_des_11800309: A camera that can capture images of the morphic field, helping the holder anticipate potential resonance effects.
equip_Getway_11800309_1_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line - Blastcall Matriarch
equip_Getway_11800309_2_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Dust Resonating Phosphor
equip_des_11800310: Mounting a gun on a treasure-seeking rod — wouldn't it be able to discover treasures and automatically lock onto enemies?\n[This equipment is unique.]
equip_des_11800311: People who listen to this song will fall into a state of frenzy, becoming extremely excited and more aggressive. Sometimes, there may even be more severe consequences.
equip_Getway_11800311_1_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line - Blastcall Matriarch
equip_Getway_11800311_2_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Dust Resonating Phosphor
equip_des_11800312: A metal not native to Earth. Originally rare, but after The Secondary Moon incident, various non-Earth materials are everywhere, and this metal has become commonplace.
equip_Getway_11800312_1_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line - Blastcall Matriarch
equip_Getway_11800312_2_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Dust Resonating Phosphor
equip_des_11800313: If you fail to hypnotize someone using the swinging of a pocket watch, perhaps it's because you're using the wrong pocket watch — why not try this one?
equip_Getway_11800313_0_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line - Blastcall Matriarch
equip_Getway_11800313_1_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Dust Resonating Phosphor
equip_des_11800314: It will spring forth arcane energy like a fountain, providing energy replenishment to the wearer.
equip_Getway_11800314_1_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Dusk Direphant
equip_Getway_11800315_0_DisplayName: Freeport Ⅶ C.R.B.S.E. Agency Bounty Quest
equip_Getway_11800315_2_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Chillwave Airbladder
equip_Getway_11800315_3_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Glacial Bone Dragon
equip_des_11800316: A weapon designed for summoning lightning. It faced operational challenges due to magnetic issues with a crucial component. However, a powerful Ascender altered its magnetic properties, thereby enabling it to actually summon lightning.\n [This equipment is unique.]
equip_Getway_11800316_0_DisplayName: Anita Energy Research Institute – Nicola – Exchange
equip_des_11800002: Unlike the faction that pursues Shadowcraft and Strange Spark, the creator of this weapon believes in empowering ordinary individuals with magical abilities. Even in the hands of a commoner, this weapon possesses devastating power.
equip_Getway_11800002_1_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Dusk Direphant
equip_des_11800001: This life form was captured in the labyrinth by the scholars of the Citadel. All things undergo a constant cycle of birth and death, and through this eye, one can catch a glimpse of the mysteries of existence.\n[This equipment is unique.]
equip_des_11800003: When placed in complete darkness, it summons an ancient power that not even the Citadel can fully comprehend, which often results in catastrophic consequences.\n[This equipment is unique.]
equip_des_11800006: This device is an adaptation derived from an enigmatic technological creation discovered in the chaos world. Due to limitations in Anita's technology, it is unable to operate at its fullest capacity, and its energy can only incrementally increase over time. It is estimated that after 34 years of uninterrupted operation, it will emit enough rays to potentially destroy the world, although this is still far from reaching its limit.\n[This equipment is unique.]
equip_des_11800007: An ancient artifact from the mysterious east, collected by Night Chains. Its remarkable ability to cut through anything and its unique preservation methods have garnered widespread belief among the Empire citizens that it possesses the power of magic. However, the origins and principles underlying its magic differ from those of Mandus, and the true secret may only be known to Night Chains.\n [This equipment is unique.]
equip_des_11800008: This weapon, developed by the Earth Union, harnesses evidently hazardous technology. Its power is so formidable that even the Citadel refrains from recovering it. The mere presence of this weapon hinders the Earth Union's Jupiter exploration project.\n[This equipment is unique.]
equip_des_11800009: This weapon is a rare creation of the Citadel with a singular purpose of destruction. It does not incorporate high-dimensional, timeline, or morphic resonance technology. As long as the temperature is high enough, there is nothing that it cannot melt.\n[This equipment is unique.]
equip_des_11800011: Confiscated marauder armor coated in cactus juice. It is widely believed by marauders that cactus works wonders in combating morphic field pollution and can also be used for healing.\n[This equipment is unique.]
equip_des_11800013: Confiscated from Judy, this transmitter was not originally designed to be fowl-friendly and later adopted a structure that could be hung from a goose. While humans can use it too, its efficiency depends on the user's posture.\n[This equipment is unique.]
equip_des_11800012: A charm that helps people relax and calm their nerves. It was once attached to a computer, enhancing its memory operation efficiency.
equip_Getway_11800012_2_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Dust Resonating Phosphor
equip_Getway_11800012_3_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Dusk Direphant
equip_Getway_11800012_4_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Chaos-Infused Stone Fungus
equip_des_11800015: A charm that harnesses a mysterious energy called 'celestial thunder.' While primarily used for combat, it can also recharge electronic devices.
equip_Getway_11800015_3_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Dust Resonating Phosphor
equip_Getway_11800015_4_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Dusk Direphant
equip_Getway_11800015_5_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Chaos-Infused Stone Fungus
equip_des_11800016: Automatically deployed in battle, these drones use Trigram Mirrors to create favorable Fengshui effects on the battlefield.
equip_Getway_11800016_3_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Dust Resonating Phosphor
equip_Getway_11800016_4_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Dusk Direphant
equip_Getway_11800016_5_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Chaos-Infused Stone Fungus
equip_des_11800017: Deep Sleeper Wood struck by lightning summoned through an ascension ability, possessing the power to deter ordinary Deep Sleepers and Chaos Remains.
equip_Getway_11800017_1_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line - Blastcall Matriarch
equip_Getway_11800017_2_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Dust Resonating Phosphor
equip_des_11800018: A formation formed by commanding eight drones, its power strong enough to subdue large Chaos Remains with ease.\n[This equipment is unique.]
equip_des_11800019: Deep Sleeper Wood struck by lightning summoned through an ascension ability, possessing the power to deter ordinary Deep Sleepers and Chaos Remains.
equip_Getway_11800019_1_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line - Blastcall Matriarch
equip_Getway_11800019_2_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Dust Resonating Phosphor
equip_des_11800022: A tool invented by a talented engineer at Cloud Bridge, enabling the creation of two interconnecting portals on walls. However, since the exit was too high above ground level, his escape attempt resulted in severe injury, and his tool was damaged. As a result, the exit portal has been permanently fixed in his cell.\n[This equipment is unique.]
equip_Getway_11800014_1_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line - Blastcall Matriarch
equip_Getway_11800014_2_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Dust Resonating Phosphor
equip_Getway_11800024_1_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line - Blastcall Matriarch
equip_Getway_11800024_2_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Dust Resonating Phosphor
equip_des_11800029: A device designed by the Citadel to delve into the Ocean of Consciousness and explore mankind's deep subconscious. When activated, it causes mental interference.
equip_Getway_11800029_0_DisplayName: Cape City C.R.B.S.E. Agency Bounty Quest
equip_Getway_11800029_2_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Glacial Bone Dragon
equip_Getway_11800029_3_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Chaos-Infused Stone Fungus
equip_des_11800031: A time-keeper imitating a pulsar, boasting precision surpassing an atomic clock. It emits light-speed pulses at a frequency of a thousand revolutions per second, capable of releasing powerful pulses.
equip_Getway_11800031_0_DisplayName: Cape City C.R.B.S.E. Agency Bounty Quest
equip_Getway_11800031_2_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Glacial Bone Dragon
equip_Getway_11800031_3_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Chaos-Infused Stone Fungus
equip_des_11800033: Able to transit the wearer to a non-probabilistic state, entangling atoms within the armor with particles in random corners of the universe, thus deflecting incoming attacks.
equip_Getway_11800033_0_DisplayName: Cape City C.R.B.S.E. Agency Bounty Quest
equip_Getway_11800033_2_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Glacial Bone Dragon
equip_Getway_11800033_3_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line – Chaos-Infused Stone Fungus
equip_des_11800041: This equipment, resembling an exaggerated electromagnet from animated shows, is believed to have the ability to propel large vehicles by interacting with their metal shells, generating endless power. Due to its excessive strength, it was deemed hazardous and confiscated by the Cloud Bridge Base.\n[This equipment is unique.]
equip_des_11800042: Deep Sleeper Wood struck by lightning summoned through an ascension ability, possessing the power to deter ordinary Deep Sleepers and Chaos Remains.
equip_Getway_11800042_1_DisplayName: Chaos Buoy Along the Line - Blastcall Matriarch

tag_detail_12601033: Sets the entire battlefield on fire, dealing damage to both allies and enemies alike, once every second for 6 seconds\nDispels Chill and Freeze effects from all units.
tag_detail_12601034: Engulfs a large area in front in flames, dealing damage to all enemy units within the area once every second for 6 seconds.
tag_detail_12601035: Engulfs a large area in front in flames, dealing damage to all enemy units within the area once every second for 6 seconds.
tag_detail_12601036: Engulfs a large area in front in flames, dealing damage to all enemy units within the area once every second for 6 seconds.
tag_detail_12601037: Engulfs a large area in front in flames, dealing damage to all enemy units within the area once every second for 6 seconds.
tag_detail_12601038: Engulfs a large area in front in flames, dealing damage to all enemy units within the area once every second for 6 seconds.
tag_detail_12601049: Normal attacks and Magnetic Pulse have a 30% chance to trigger Triple Shot.
tag_detail_12601050: Using the leader skill generates a Sing in your hand. This effect can only be triggered once.
tag_detail_12601056: After using Sharpening Technique, the next 5 hits Ignite the targets.
tag_detail_12601057: After using Sharpening Technique 3 times, grants this character Magnetization.\nMagnetization fully restores HP and increases and Attack by 10%. This effect stacks.
tag_detail_12601059: Under Magnetization, reduces the cost of Box Swordsmanship by 2.
tag_detail_12601060: After using Cross Slash, there's a 30% chance to follow up with Vertical Cleave.
tag_detail_12601061: After using Vertical Cleave, there's a 30% chance to follow up with Cross Slash.
tag_detail_12601062: After using Rage Strike, there's a 30% chance to use Rage Strike again.
tag_detail_12600157: 每次使用【暗艺】时，额外造成1段负能伤害\n我方全体生命值上限之和/平均攻击力越高，伤害越高
tag_detail_12600223: Deals damage to enemies once and Ignites them.\nCelestial Fire is considered Explosive.\nWhen you have at least 18 Celestial Fire, newly generated Celestial Fire is automatically used.
tag_detail_12601099: Playing a Blue card restores 10% of Max HP.\nAlso, grants Poise for 5 seconds.
tag_detail_12601100: Using a Magnetic Flywheel enables all Magnetic Flywheel to strike one more time during this battle, stacking up to 12 times.
tag_detail_12601102: Whenever a unit is Frozen (allies and enemies alike), restores 0.3 Mana.
tag_detail_12601105: Using Blast Support grants all allies Shield for 10 seconds.\nThe Shield's durability is equal to 1000% of this character's Defense.
tag_detail_12601106: Cluster Bombs strike enemies in a larger area and inflict Shield Break and Corruption.
tag_detail_12601109: Using Tactical Grenade or Cluster Bomb reduces the cost of the next Red card played by 1.
tag_detail_12601110: After using Cluster Bomb, the next Explosive card played is triggered once more.
tag_detail_12601119: Whenever a Black card is Destroyed, there is a 50% chance to generate a Shadowcraft in your hand.
tag_detail_12601122: 连续打出2张红卡时，红卡造成的最终伤害提高5%，上限100%
tag_detail_12600104: When Legge Bomber is discarded into the discard pile, it is considered as played.\nWhen Legge Bomber is played, reduces the cooldown of Discard by 5 seconds.
tag_detail_12601128: Using Legge Bomber has a 30% chance to draw a Bingo! from your deck or discard pile to your hand, with its cost reduced to 0.
tag_detail_12601129: Upon encountering a new wave of enemies, releases a Bingo!
tag_detail_12601130: When a Tactical Grenade is discarded, it is considered played.\nUsing a Tactical Grenade restores 10% of Max HP.
tag_detail_12601131: After using Lock-on Sniping, adds a Lock-on Sniping from your deck to your hand.
tag_detail_12601149: 打出红卡或红卡进入弃牌区时，生成1个【天火】
tag_detail_12601153: Generates a Celestial Fire whenever a Yellow card is played or discarded.
tag_detail_12601158: After using Darksteel Slash, adds a Link Between from the deck or discard pile to your hand.\nWhen this character is the leader, immediately activates the leader skill.
tag_detail_12601166: After using Strange Spark, generates a Seedcore in your hand.\nGains immunity to Fetter and Imprisonment.
tag_detail_12601187: 使用【血噬】后，生成1张【暗艺】加入手牌\n使用【血噬】/【血之冠】后使自身攻击力和防御力+2%，上限52%
tag_detail_12601205: Upon using this character's skill card, gains Berserk.
tag_detail_12601208: 每有1张【暗艺】被【销毁】时，回复我方全体2%生命值\n同时使自身【普通攻击】伤害提高13%，上限390%
tag_detail_12601267: Whenever you obtain a Purple card or use Chaotic Cannon MEGA, Judy launches 2 Corn Bombs, each dealing damage to a random enemy once and inflicting Corruption.
tag_detail_12601268: Whenever Chaotic Cannon MEGA is used, Judy launches a Healing Bomb that heals the ally with the lowest HP for 10% of their Max HP.\nIn addition, adds one of this character's skill cards from your deck or discard pile to your hand.
tag_detail_12601258: Cancels the target's current attack and knocks them back a distance, ineffective against large enemies.
tag_detail_12601266: Upon obtaining a Red card belonging to herself, Judy fires a Disturbance Bomb at a random target.
tag_detail_12601222: Upon using Mimicry, draws a card, prioritizing a Yellow one.\nUpon using Reconstruct, gains Berserk.
tag_detail_12601313: Using Mimicry increases all backline allies' Attack by 6%. This effect stacks.
tag_detail_12601329: Attacks heal this character for 13% of the damage dealt.
tag_detail_12601337: Whenever this character's skill card is used, gains Poise for 2 seconds.
tag_detail_12601338: After using The Endless or Avarice, the next Shadowcraft played does not cost Mana.
tag_detail_12601343: The aftershock of Starfall deals double damage.
tag_detail_12601344: 使用【暗艺】后，下1次【队长技】伤害提高50%，可叠加
tag_detail_12601358: Using Summer Bubble heals all allies for 5% of their Max HP.\nDispels the weather Heat, Scorching Heat, and Blazing Heat.\nRemoves Searing Earth, Prairie Blaze, and Sea of Fire effects on your side.
tag_detail_12601398: When the allied marked by Perception Intervention is attacked, retrieves an Induced Awakening from your deck or discard pile to your hand. This effect can be triggered once every 10 seconds.
tag_detail_12601399: While the Covenant of Life is active, all allies receive doubled healing.\nWhile the Covenant of Life is active, if this character takes fatal damage, nullifies the damage and gains Invulnerability for 3 seconds. In addition, generates a Black card 'Reverengy' to your deck.
tag_detail_12601407: After Psychic Storm is triggered, whenever a card is played within the next 6 seconds, Doppelganger consumes 10 Energy to release a psychic pulse, dealing damage to all enemies once and reducing their Defense by 1%. This effect stacks..
tag_detail_12601424: 使用【元素核·冰】后，使生命值最低的1名我方目标获得【护盾】，持续10秒，【护盾】的耐久为自身防御力的2000%\n同时自身免疫【冻结】/【冻伤】/【冰封】效果
tag_detail_12601434: While Iron Curtain exists, Paladi gains Poise and grants all frontline allies immunity to Interrupt and Stun.
tag_detail_12601435: When Iron Curtain is breached, immediately plays Fire Wall.\nIn addition, increases all allies' Defense by 3%. This effect stacks.
tag_detail_12601436: After Paladi uses Riot Suppression, A-2SO releases a barrage of bullets on random enemies over 6 hits.\nIn addition, an additional A-2SO robot will participate in the next Riot Suppression, offering normal attacks as auxiliary support, with a maximum of 4 extra robots.
tag_detail_12601437: 每30秒触发1次，受到伤害时，若场上没有【铁幕】，从牌库或弃牌区将1张【铁幕】加入手牌\n每次使用蓝卡后，自身攻击力+2%，上限30%
tag_detail_12601438: Enemies affected by Prairie Blaze take 20% more final damage.\nFor each Prairie Blaze stack, the target takes 5% more final damage, stacking up to 6 times.
tag_detail_12601447: Upon using Charge, draws a card, prioritizing this character's skill cards.
tag_detail_12601451: Penetrating Shot and Burst Shot have a 30% chance to launch once more.
tag_detail_12601459: Reduces the target's Attack and Defense by 10% for 6 seconds. The affected target loses 1% of Energy per second.
tag_detail_12601463: When Magnet Trap disappears, grants the ally with the lowest HP a Magnetic Shield. The shield is equal to 2000% of this character's Defense and lasts for 10 seconds.\nThe shielded ally takes 50% less EM damage.
tag_detail_12601465: For every 100,000 Volt Value accumulated, adds a Mega Volt to your hand.\nFor every 1,000,000 Volt Value accumulated, adds a Giga Volt to the top of your deck.
tag_detail_12601466: While EM Field is in effect, all allies take 1% less final damage for every 10,000 Volt Value accumulated, up to a maximum of 50%.
tag_detail_12601467: While Magnet Trap is in effect, whenever an allied backline unit Electrifies enemies 5 times, they gain a 1% Attack bonus. This effect stacks.
tag_detail_12601468: Generates 500 more Volt Value.\nCasting Giga Volt enables all Electrification cards to deal 15% more damage. This effect stacks.
tag_detail_12601714: Increases the target's final damage taken by 15% for 5 seconds.
tag_detail_12601713: Reduces the target's Attack and Defense by 10% for 6 seconds. The affected target loses 1% of Energy per second.
tag_detail_12601711: Doubles the chance for the target to be Electrified for 6 seconds.

skill_description_12300020: 投掷1枚烟雾弹，使敌方全体失去攻击目标，持续#r秒\n【烟雾弹】为【爆炸物】

献祭当前生命值的#r，摇动【绯烬琉璃】，将【普通攻击】转化为：
回复除自身外我方#r生命值，持续#r秒，时间可叠加
持续时间结束后，转化为初始【普通攻击】
此卡进入弃牌区时，有50%概率生成1张【暗艺】加入手牌

对敌方全体造成1段伤害，回复自身#r生命值

skill_description_12300449: \"I will be back!\"\n波克士自我报废，生成#r张【修复磁盘】加入牌库
skill_description_12300461: “屋漏偏逢连夜雨” 进行紧急修理，自身获得【霸体】，持续#r秒 持续期间，每秒修理自身#r生命值 【大破修理】期间无法释放自身技能
skill_description_12300464: “添砖加瓦，未雨绸缪”\n加固神盾，使自身生命值上限+#r，自身防御力+#r
skill_description_12300465: “来揍我呀~”\n启动【挨揍模式】，使自身受到的伤害降低#r，持续#r秒\n持续期间，嘲讽敌方前排，使敌方前排【打断】并以自己为目标攻击，结束后解除嘲讽
skill_description_12300466: “再使劲点！”\n启动【超级抗揍模式】，使自身受到的伤害降低#r，持续#r秒\n持续期间，嘲讽敌方全体，使敌方全体【打断】并以自己为目标攻击，结束后解除嘲讽
skill_description_12300515: “星期一，睡大觉” 使自身【昏睡】 在身前召唤使魔【星期一】，使魔不会被敌方攻击 【星期一】的攻击力等于薇尔岚的攻击力 从【惊魂夜】/【镇魂歌】/【魔力泉】中，选择1张加入手牌 使用后【寻梦】转化为【织梦】

生成1个前排的诱饵气球吸引火力
气球爆炸时，对范围内敌方造成1段伤害并<color=#FF6666>【击晕】</color>，同时触发<yellow>【落雷】</yellow>
诱饵气球为【爆炸物】

若手牌中有【新星】和【元素核·冰】将自动融合为【霜冻新星】

使用后【销毁】

同时释放中微子脉冲，持续5秒，每秒对敌方全体造成1段伤害，同时触发<color=#FF6666>【蚀灭】</color>

skill_description_12301488:
Destroys a Resonance in your hand and fully restores the target ally's HP.
Dispels all mass-control and damage-over-time effects from the target ally.
This card can only be played when you have Resonance in your hand.
This card is Destroyed when played or discarded.
skill_description_12301496:
Activates the Deconstruction Box, shuffling all cards in your hand into the deck and drawing 3 cards.
Generates Constructive Flame equal to the number of Red cards shuffled in your hand.
Generates Disintegrating Thunder equal to the number of Yellow cards shuffled in your hand.
Generates Reconstructive Power equal to the number of Blue cards shuffled in your hand.
Generates Reverengy equal to the number of Green cards shuffled in your hand.
Generates Purifying Light equal to the number of Purple cards shuffled in your hand.

equip_des_11800049: 黑月为特殊战斗人员制造的护甲，在帝国人看来，这种护甲毫无疑问利用了被帝国称为“魔法”的技术，但其原理与帝国却完全不同。
equip_des_11800050: 黑月收藏的另一件古物，并未检测出任何魔法痕迹或者形态场异常，一度被认为只是普通工艺品。但其每一任主人在处于致命危险时，总能奇迹般的化险为夷。且在那之后勾玉都会无预兆得损坏裂开，每次也只是按照修复工艺品的方式将其修复。\n【此装备唯一】
equip_des_11800051: 说谎遭雷劈，所以能增加引雷几率。
equip_des_11800054: 地联黄金时期的科技产物，能最大化保护使用者的生命安全。现在的铁盟已经失去了制造这样精良护甲的能力。
equip_des_11800056: 黑月叛逃人员使用的防具，其上的黑月标志被破坏，代表着其前主人反抗黑月的决心。若前主人是强大的升构者，则这种意志可能会保留在护额之上，起到意想不到的效果。
equip_Getway_11800056_0_DisplayName: 澄明数据中心铁安局悬赏任务
equip_des_11800058: 帝国研究的抵御秘能的材料
equip_des_11800059: 对学会的贤者们来说，知识就是生命，所以保存知识就是保存自己的生命。于是他们制造了将自己的记忆和知识保存在身体之外的装置，这样即便身体受到了致命伤，生命也不会随之消逝。
equip_des_11800060: 一块未知来源的奇异非晶体化石，其内部闪烁着一个仍在运转的完整星系。经过超高倍率的显微放大后，能观测到其中恒星系运行的轨迹。\n【此装备唯一】
equip_des_11800061: 许愿塔的光芒并非来自太阳，按地联科学家的话说其星光来源于一颗B型恒星。而帝国的学者对其研究更深，他们认为许愿塔之星还存在一颗伴星，并借助其力量制造出了一支法杖。
equip_des_11800062: 黑月为特殊战斗人员打造的武器，与古物糜草龙雀有着类似的“魔法”技术。不知是黑月从古物里复制来了技术，还是打造这种武器的技艺其实从未失传。
equip_Getway_11800062_0_DisplayName: 澄明数据中心铁安局悬赏任务
equip_des_11800064: 现实稳定装置中用于给设备紧急降温的工具，后来被现实稳定装置的保安在紧急情况下用于镇暴。发现其能使金属变脆，战斗中对民用装甲有奇效。
equip_des_11800065: 代号为尼克塔尔的学会先导去世前制造的装置，据说是其理解的宇宙终极难题的答案。但没发现除了消灭暴露在它范围内的一切生命外的其它功能。
equip_des_11800066: ANITA的研究员对球状闪电这一自然现象的研究结果，最终发现球状闪电并不是普通的放电现象，而是与基本粒子的波函数坍缩有关。能够以不可预测的方式破坏物质结构，甚至作用于基本粒子层面。在制造出原型机后被学会发现并没收。
equip_des_11800020: 高污染地区的居民们猎杀骨龙后用龙骨制成的盔甲，穿上它不仅能克制桦树生物，对荒野中的歹徒恶霸们，也会产生震慑效果。
equip_des_11800067: 学会研究声学的贤者发现的现象，展示了振动频率如何影响振动表面上的驻波模式。后来在形态共振的研究中也发现了类似现象，该设备会调制使用者的形态场，使其最大程度地作用于目标。
equip_des_11800027: 撰文迷宫的检索装置，其中心的石板被认为来源于迷宫自身的意志，被学会的先贤打捞出来。
equip_des_11800068: 黑月为特殊战斗人员打造的动力外骨骼，能极大增强防御力和力量，这与黑月一贯的隐秘作风相悖。但即便是黑月，也有不得不直面强敌的时候。
equip_Getway_11800068_0_DisplayName: 澄明数据中心铁安局悬赏任务
equip_des_11800078: 刚进入曼杜斯时，帝国经历了瘟疫、饥荒、战乱和严寒，后来帝国人战胜了这四种灾难，并制作了这块护符，象征着对这四重灾厄的封印。尽管帝国并不是完全依靠魔法战胜的这四种灾难，但护符所代表的意义仍使其具备特殊的魔法力量。

skill_description_12303520: 造成的最终伤害提高20%，可叠加
skill_description_12303505:
召唤骸骨使魔【弗莱格桑】登场作战
每次抽到卡牌时，基于抽到卡牌的费用，发起冲锋，对敌方全体造成等量段数伤害并<color=#FF6666>【击退】</color>，同时触发1次<red>【燎原】</red>，有效3次
【弗莱格桑】冲锋结束后化为【科赛特斯】，使敌方全体<color=#7AB2FF>【冰封】</color>，同时为我方抵御伤害
黑卡费用视为5费
【弗莱格桑】/【科赛特斯】为【使魔】
【弗莱格桑】的攻击力等于真咲的攻击力
【科赛特斯】的生命值等于生命值最高的我方的当前生命值
skill_description_12303509:
召唤暗影使魔【倪克斯】和【厄瑞波斯】附身敌方目标，持续10秒
持续期间：
每秒对敌方目标随机触发1次<color=#FFB800>【轰雷】</color>/<color=#FF6666>【炽地】</color>/<color=#7AB2FF>【冻伤】</color>
敌方目标每受到1次特殊效果，对敌方目标造成1段伤害
【倪克斯】响应的特殊效果包含：
<color=#FFB800>【轰雷】</color>/<color=#FFB800>【轰顶】</color>/<color=#FFB800>【磁化】</color>/<color=#FFB800>【麻痹】</color>/<color=#FF6666>【炽地】</color>/<red>【燎原】</red>/<color=#7AB2FF>【冻伤】</color>/<color=#7AB2FF>【冰封】</color>/<color=#FF6666>【斩裂】</color>/<color=#FF6666>【撕裂】</color>/<red>【灼心】</red>/<color=#FF6666>【打断】</color>/<color=#FF6666>【击晕】</color>/<color=#FF6666>【击退】</color>/<color=#FF6666>【击飞】</color>
【厄瑞波斯】响应的特殊效果包含：
<color=#FF6666>【蚀灭】</color>/<color=#FF6666>【裂蚀】</color>/<color=#FF6666>【重伤】</color>/<color=#FF6666>【崩坏】</color>/<color=#B383FF>【混乱】</color>/<purple>【昏睡】</purple>/<color=#B383FF>【变萌】</color>/<color=#B383FF>【禁锢】</color>/<color=#B383FF>【枷锁】</color>/<color=#B383FF>【诅咒】</color>/<color=#B383FF>【注视】</color>/<color=#B383FF>【致幻】</color>
【倪克斯】和【厄瑞波斯】为【使魔】
【倪克斯】的攻击力为真咲的攻击力
【厄瑞波斯】的攻击力为真咲的防御力

skill_description_12303588: "小宝宝，耳朵灵，听铃声，找到铃" 在身前召唤使魔【塔隆】，使魔不会被敌方攻击 【塔隆】为【使魔】，协同冰冻属性【普通攻击】 【塔隆】的攻击力等于瑞瓦的防御力 使用后【销毁】

skill_description_12303591: "乖巧的塔隆最喜欢瑞瓦了" 使自身防御力+5，上限200 抽1张牌，同时从牌库丢弃1~2张牌 使用后【销毁】

skill_description_12303594: "听见了吗？孩子们美妙的和声！" 从牌库丢弃5~8张牌，基于丢弃卡牌的数量 【塔隆】在场时，对敌方全体造成等量段数伤害并【崩坏】 【科劳】在场时，对敌方全体造成等量段数伤害并【重伤】 同时生成1张【奇异火花】加入手牌 使用后【销毁】

抽2张牌，其中1张优先自身技能牌，基于抽到卡牌的费用之和，获得等量费用

break_desc_12100864: 牌库每有1张卡牌，敌方全体受到的最终伤害增加1%，上限50%
break_desc_12100865:
【恶魔】增强为：
召唤暗影使魔【倪克斯】和【厄瑞波斯】附身敌方目标，持续10秒
持续期间：
每秒对敌方目标随机触发1次<color=#FFB800>【轰雷】</color>/<color=#FF6666>【炽地】</color>/<color=#7AB2FF>【冻伤】</color>
敌方目标每受到1次特殊效果，对敌方目标造成1段伤害
【倪克斯】响应的特殊效果包含：
<color=#FFB800>【轰雷】</color>/<color=#FFB800>【轰顶】</color>/<color=#FFB800>【磁化】</color>/<color=#FFB800>【麻痹】</color>/<color=#FF6666>【炽地】</color>/<red>【燎原】</red>/<color=#7AB2FF>【冻伤】</color>/<color=#7AB2FF>【冰封】</color>/<color=#FF6666>【斩裂】</color>/<color=#FF6666>【撕裂】</color>/<red>【灼心】</red>/<color=#FF6666>【打断】</color>/<color=#FF6666>【击晕】</color>/<color=#FF6666>【击退】</color>/<color=#FF6666>【击飞】</color>
【厄瑞波斯】响应的特殊效果包含：
<color=#FF6666>【蚀灭】</color>/<color=#FF6666>【裂蚀】</color>/<color=#FF6666>【重伤】</color>/<color=#FF6666>【崩坏】</color>/<color=#B383FF>【混乱】</color>/<purple>【昏睡】</purple>/<color=#B383FF>【变萌】</color>/<color=#B383FF>【禁锢】</color>/<color=#B383FF>【枷锁】</color>/<color=#B383FF>【诅咒】</color>/<color=#B383FF>【注视】</color>/<color=#B383FF>【致幻】</color>
【倪克斯】和【厄瑞波斯】为【使魔】
【倪克斯】的攻击力为真咲的攻击力
【厄瑞波斯】的攻击力为真咲的防御力
break_desc_12100866: 每次成为【教皇】的我方目标，叠加【圣杯】层数\n每层【圣杯】使目标攻击力和防御力+30，上限5层\n切换【教皇】目标时，移除所有的【圣杯】层数
break_desc_12100857: 每次我方造成<color=#FFB800>【轰雷】</color>/<color=#FFB800>【轰顶】</color>时，回复生命值最低的1名我方1%/3%生命值
break_desc_12100868: 我方造成的<color=#FFB800>【轰雷】</color>有20%概率触发<color=#FFB800>【轰顶】</color>\n每次我方造成<color=#FFB800>【轰顶】</color>时，获得1点费用
break_desc_12100870: 当前每拥有1点费用，我方全体造成的电磁伤害提高5%，上限100%
break_desc_12100871: 每次我方造成<color=#FFB800>【轰雷】</color>/<color=#FFB800>【轰顶】</color>时，自身攻击力+0.5%/+1.5%，上限99%
break_desc_12100873:
开局时为我方队友叠加1层【凭依】层数
每使用3张【龙裔】的卡牌，获得1点费用
每抽到6张卡牌，使敌方场地触发<red>【燎原】</red>并有45%概率使自身<color=#FF6666>【躁动】</color>
弃牌区每增加9张牌，<color=#FF6666>【烬灭】</color>伤害提高20%，上限180%
break_desc_12100887: 每有1层【凭依】，红卡造成的最终伤害提高3%，上限60%
break_desc_12100888: 每次我方造成<color=#FF6666>【点燃】</color>/<color=#FF6666>【炽地】</color>/<red>【燎原】</red>/<red>【熔心】</red>/ <color=#FF6666>【烬灭】</color>时，自身攻击力+0.15%/+0.3%/+0.6%/+1.8%/+3.6%，上限99%
break_desc_12100890: 每有1名【龙裔】，自然回费速度提高20%，手牌补充冷却时间缩短0.2秒，【弃牌】指令冷却时间缩短1秒
talent_desc_12800134: 自身技能牌从牌库中被丢弃时，会直接加入手牌
talent_desc_12800135: 开局抽2张牌，且能超出手牌上限\n同时丢弃除自身技能牌以外的所有手牌，每丢弃1张，自身造成的最终伤害提高5%
talent_desc_12800137: 将【奇异火花】造成伤害的5%回复我方全体生命值
talent_desc_12800324: 每次牌库抽光触发洗牌时，生成1张【渊底的和声】加入手牌
talent_desc_12800243: 使用【爆破支援】后，使我方全体获得<color=#7AB2FF>【护盾】</color>，持续10秒\n<color=#7AB2FF>【护盾】</color>的耐久为自身防御力的1000%
talent_desc_12800249: 打出2费及以上蓝卡后，使我方全体获得<color=#7AB2FF>【护盾】</color>，持续10秒，<color=#7AB2FF>【护盾】</color>的耐久为自身防御力的1000%
talent_desc_12800590: 【鰹节火箭弹】造成伤害时，触发<color=#FF6666>【炽地】</color>，同时有20%概率触发<red>【燎原】</red>
talent_desc_12800591: 使用【弃牌】指令丢弃【松果快递！】时，视为使用\n【松果快递！】被正常使用时，额外收集1枚【松果能量块】
talent_desc_12800592: 每枚【松果钻地炸弹】钻地期间，每秒获得0.33点费用
talent_desc_12800593: 【芥末棒骨！】增强为：\n治疗范围内我方目标，回复其25%生命值并<color=#7AB2FF>【净化】</color>\n此卡被丢弃入弃牌区时，自身攻击力+3%，上限60%
talent_desc_12800596:
每次获得【女皇】/【皇帝】/【教皇】时，判断选中卡牌的正逆
若为正位，则生成1个【皇家卫兵】登场作战
若为逆位，则生成1个【影子枪兵】登场作战
【皇家卫兵】/【影子枪兵】为【使魔】，协同火焰属性/冰冻属性【普通攻击】，上限6只
【皇家卫兵】/【影子枪兵】的攻击力等于真咲的攻击力，生命值等于真咲生命值的33%
talent_desc_12800597:
【战车】增强为：
召唤骸骨使魔【弗莱格桑】登场作战
每次抽到卡牌时，基于抽到卡牌的费用，发起冲锋，对敌方全体造成等量段数伤害并<color=#FF6666>【击退】</color>，同时触发1次<red>【燎原】</red>，有效3次
【弗莱格桑】冲锋结束后化为【科赛特斯】，使敌方全体<color=#7AB2FF>【冰封】</color>，同时为我方抵御伤害
黑卡费用视为5费
【弗莱格桑】/【科赛特斯】为【使魔】
【弗莱格桑】的攻击力等于真咲的攻击力
【科赛特斯】的生命值等于生命值最高的我方的当前生命值
talent_desc_12800598: 开局的前5张手牌中，必有1张【魔术师】\n使用【女皇】/【皇帝】/【教皇】后，抽1张牌
talent_desc_12800599:
使用【恶魔】后，生成1张【暗艺】加入手牌，且能超出手牌上限
【恶魔】存在期间：
【恶魔】每累计造成39段伤害，生成1张【恶果】加入手牌，且能超出手牌上限
若手牌中有【恶果】和【暗艺】将自动融合为【‌无界之渊】，且能超出手牌上限
talent_desc_12800601: 我方造成的<color=#FFB800>【引雷】</color>/<color=#FFB800>【轰雷】</color>有20%概率伤害加倍，<color=#FFB800>【轰雷】</color>/<color=#FFB800>【轰顶】</color>有20%概率触发<color=#FF6666>【炽地】</color>
talent_desc_12800602: 自动【销毁】手牌中的所有黑卡，每【销毁】1张，对生命值最高的敌方触发<color=#FFB800>【轰顶】</color>

equip_des_11800040: 召唤自己的祖父年轻时的投影，使其代为承受攻击。但因为祖父悖论的存在，攻击会被排除到世界线之外。\n【此装备唯一】
equip_Getway_11800040_0_DisplayName: 开拓！海岛度假物语！兑换
equip_des_11800084: 学会曾经生产的一种民用产品，能够自然变得光亮的餐刀，其分子具有巨大的水平方向连接能力，因此会调整处于垂直方向的分子缓慢移动到水平方向，使其表面保持光亮。但也会使其刀刃变得越来越锋利直至变成单分子状态。几次事故后被投诉停产。\n【此装备唯一】
